jot.physics.particle_system.SPH

Class ParticleSPH

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.physics.particle_system.SPH.ParticleSPH
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Particle

    public class ParticleSPH
extends Object
implements Particle
    Class that implements a generic simplistic particle.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

        FluidGrid - the grid of fluids particles.
        BoundaryGrid - the grid of boundary particles.

      • update

        public void update(float dt)
        Description copied from interface: Particle
        Update particle acceleration, velocity, position, age, color, size. Depending on the type of update different particle effects are achieved.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Particle
        Parameters:
        dt - simulation time step.
